actions.Name: Fire in Red
actions.Description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 440.
Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues
Duration: 30s
Cannot be executed while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.
When standing within the bounds of Starry Muse, consumes a stack of Hyperphantasia if available.

actions.Name: Blizzard in Cyan
actions.Description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 800.
Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.
When standing within the bounds of Starry Muse, consumes a stack of Hyperphantasia if available.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

actions.Name: Fire II in Red
actions.Description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues
Duration: 30s
Cannot be executed while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.
When standing within the bounds of Starry Muse, consumes a stack of Hyperphantasia if available.

actions.Name: Blizzard II in Cyan
actions.Description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 240 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.
When standing within the bounds of Starry Muse, consumes a stack of Hyperphantasia if available.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

actions.Name: Holy in White
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 520 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while under the effect of White Paint.
Cannot be executed while under the effect of Monochrome Tones.
White Paint Cost: 1
When standing within the bounds of Starry Muse, consumes a stack of Hyperphantasia if available.

actions.Name: Comet in Black
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 880 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Black Paint and Monochrome Tones.
Black Paint Cost: 1
When standing within the bounds of Starry Muse, consumes a stack of Hyperphantasia if available.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

actions.Name: Mog of the Ages
actions.Description:
Render your moogle portrait to life, dealing unaspected damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 1,300 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while Moogle Portrait is active.

actions.Name: Hammer Stamp
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage as a critical direct hit with a potency of 560 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Hammer Time.

actions.Name: Star Prism
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 1,400 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores HP of all party members within 30 yalms of target
Cure Potency: 400
Can only be executed while under the effect of Starstruck.
When standing within the bounds of Starry Muse, consumes a stack of Hyperphantasia if available.

actions.Name: Subtractive Palette
actions.Name@ja: サブトラクティブパレット
actions.Description:
Grants 3 stacks of Subtractive Palette.
Additional Effect: Grants Monochrome Tones
Monochrome Tones Effect: Converts one stack of White Paint into Black Paint
Cannot be cast while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.
Palette Gauge Cost: 50

actions.Name: Smudge
actions.Description:
Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.
Additional Effect: Increases movement speed
Duration: 5s
Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Tempera Coat
actions.Description:
Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage totaling 20% of maximum HP.
Duration: 10s
Reduces the recast time of Tempera Coat by 60 seconds when barrier is completely absorbed.

actions.Name: Tempera Grassa
actions.Description:
Removes Tempera Coat to create a barrier around self and all nearby party members that absorbs damage totaling 10% of maximum HP.
Duration: 10s
Reduces the recast time of Tempera Coat by 30 seconds when barrier is completely absorbed.
Can only be executed when under the effect of Tempera Coat.

actions.Name: Rainbow Drip
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 1,000 for the first enemy, and 85% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants White Paint
Maximum Stacks: 5
When Rainbow Bright is active, Rainbow Drip can be cast immediately and its recast timer is reduced.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

actions.Name: Creature Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a creature motif.
This action changes when placed on the hotbar in the order of Pom Motif, Wing Motif, Claw Motif, and Maw Motif when executed in succession.
Cast immediately when used outside of combat.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

actions.Name: Weapon Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a weapon motif.
This action changes to Hammer Motif when placed on the hotbar.
Cast immediately when used outside of combat.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

actions.Name: Landscape Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a landscape motif.
This action changes to Starry Sky Motif when placed on the hotbar.
Cast immediately when used outside of combat.
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.
Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

actions.Name: Living Muse
actions.Description:
Render your depiction of a creature to life.
This action changes to Pom Muse, Winged Muse, Clawed Muse, or Fanged Muse based on your current motif.
Maximum Charges: 3
Can only be executed when a Creature Motif is depicted on the Creature Canvas.

actions.Name: Steel Muse
actions.Description:
Render your depiction of a weapon to life.
This action changes to Striking Muse based on your current motif.
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be executed in combat and when a Weapon Motif is depicted on the Weapon Canvas.

actions.Name: Scenic Muse
actions.Description:
Render your depiction of a landscape to life.
This action changes to Starry Muse based on your current motif.
Can only be executed in combat and when a Landscape Motif is depicted on the Landscape Canvas.

roleActions.Name: Surecast
roleActions.Description:
Spells can be cast without interruption.
Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 6s

roleActions.Name: Addle
roleActions.Description:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 5% and magic damage dealt by 10%.
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Swiftcast
roleActions.Description:
Next spell is cast immediately.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.Name: Lucid Dreaming
roleActions.Description:
Gradually restores own MP.
Potency: 55
Duration: 21s

roleActions.Name: Sleep
roleActions.Description:
Puts target and all nearby enemies to sleep.
Duration: 30s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

actions.Name: Fire in Red
actions.Description:
Delivers fire damage with a potency of 5,000.
Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues
Duration: 15s
Cannot be cast while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.

※Fire in Red changes to Aero in Green while under the effect of Aetherhues.
※Fire in Red changes to Water in Blue while under the effect of Aetherhues II.
※Fire in Red changes to Blizzard in Cyan while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.
※Fire in Red changes to Stone in Yellow while under the effect of Subtractive Palette and Aetherhues.
※Fire in Red changes to Thunder in Magenta while under the effect of Subtractive Palette and Aetherhues II.

actions.Name: Aero in Green
actions.Description:
Delivers wind damage with a potency of 6,000.
Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues II
Duration: 15s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Aetherhues.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Water in Blue
actions.Description:
Delivers water damage with a potency of 7,000.
Can only be cast while under the effect of Aetherhues II.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Blizzard in Cyan
actions.Description:
Delivers ice damage with a potency of 7,000.
Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues
Duration: 15s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Stone in Yellow
actions.Description:
Delivers earth damage with a potency of 8,000.
Additional Effect: Grants Aetherhues II
Duration: 15s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Subtractive Palette and Aetherhues.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Thunder in Magenta
actions.Description:
Delivers lightning damage with a potency of 9,000.
Can only be cast while under the effect of Subtractive Palette and Aetherhues II.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Holy in White
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 12,000
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be cast while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.
Shares a recast timer with Comet in Black.

※Holy in White changes to Comet in Black while under the effect of Subtractive Palette.

actions.Name: Comet in Black
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be cast while under the effect Subtractive Palette.
Shares a recast timer with Holy in White.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Pom Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a pom, granting Pom Motif.
Can only be cast while under the effect of Pom Sketch.
The recast timer of this action is not affected by status effects.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Wing Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a pair of wings, granting Wing Motif.
Can only be cast while under the effect of Wing Sketch.
The recast timer of this action is not affected by status effects.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Claw Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a claw, granting Claw Motif.
Can only be cast while under the effect of Claw Sketch.
The recast timer of this action is not affected by status effects.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Maw Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a maw, granting Maw Motif.
Can only be cast while under the effect of Maw Sketch.
The recast timer of this action is not affected by status effects.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Creature Motif
actions.Description:
Paints a creature motif.
This action changes to Pom Motif, Wing Motif, Claw Motif, or Maw Motif based on your current creature sketch.
The recast timer of this action is not affected by status effects.

actions.Name: Pom Muse
actions.Description:
Render a rain of poms, dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Increases damage dealt and healing potency by 20%
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Grants Wing Sketch
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be cast while under the effect of Pom Motif.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Winged Muse
actions.Description:
Render a pair of windborne wings, dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Reduces spell cast time and recast time by 25%, while also increasing movement speed by 25%
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Grants Moogle Portrait
Additional Effect: Grants Claw Sketch
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be cast while under the effect of Wing Motif.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Clawed Muse
actions.Description:
Render a sharpened claw, dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Increases target's damage taken by 10%, while reducing HP recovered by healing actions by 20%
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Grants Maw Sketch
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be cast while under the effect of Claw Motif.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Fanged Muse
actions.Description:
Render a set of ferocious fangs, dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Damage over time
Potency: 4,000
Duration: 12s
Additional Effect: Grants Madeen Portrait
Additional Effect: Grants Pom Sketch
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be cast while under the effect of Maw Motif.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Living Muse
actions.Description:
Render your depiction of a creature to life.
This action changes to Pom Muse, Winged Muse, Clawed Muse, or Fanged Muse based on your current motif.
The recast timer of this action is not affected by status effects.

actions.Name: Smudge
actions.Description:
Quickly dash 15 yalms forward.
Additional Effect: Increases movement speed by 25%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Quick Sketch
Quick Sketch Effect: Next motif is rendered instantly
Duration: 10s
Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Tempera Coat
actions.Description:
Grants Tempera Coat.
Tempera Coat Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 12,000 potency
Duration: 10s
Reduces the recast time of Tempera Coat by 5 seconds when barrier is completely absorbed.

※Tempera Coat changes to Tempera Grassa while under the effect of Tempera Coat.

actions.Name: Tempera Grassa
actions.Description:
Ends the effect of Tempera Coat and grants Tempera Grassa to self and nearby party members.
Tempera Grassa Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency
Duration: 10s
Reduces the recast time of Tempera Coat by 5 seconds when barrier is completely absorbed.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Tempera Coat.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Subtractive Palette
actions.Name@ja: サブトラクティブパレット
actions.Description:
Grants Subtractive Palette.
Effect ends upon reuse.

actions.Name: Release Subtractive Palette
actions.Name@ja: サブトラクティブパレット解除
actions.Description: Cancels the effect of Subtractive Palette.

actions.Name: Advent of Chocobastion
actions.Name@ja: ウォール・オブ・ファット
actions.Description:
Render a fat chocobo, knocking back all enemies within range 15 yalms.
Additional Effect: Creates a Chocobastion at your feet, reducing damage taken by 25% while increasing HP recovered by healing actions by 25% for self and all party members within the area
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants Starstruck
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.
Gauge Charge Time: 105s

※Action changes to Star Prism upon execution.

actions.Name: Star Prism
actions.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 16,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Restores HP of all party members within 30 yalms of target
Cure Potency: 16,000
Additional Effect: Increases damage dealt by all party members within 30 yalms of target by 10%
Duration: 15s

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Mog of the Ages
actions.Description:
Render your moogle portrait to life, dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to all enemies in a straight line.
Additional Effect: Silences target
Duration: 2s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Moogle Portrait.

※Mog of the Ages changes to Retribution of the Madeen while under the effect of Madeen Portrait.

actions.Name: Retribution of the Madeen
actions.Name@ja: マディーンレトリビューション
actions.Description:
Render your Madeen portrait to life, dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to all enemies in a straight line.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 2s
Can only be cast while under the effect of Madeen Portrait.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

roleActions.Name: Guard
roleActions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 90% and grants immunity to Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, and knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 5s
Movement speed is reduced by 50% for the duration of this effect.
Effect ends upon reuse, using another action, or when the effect duration expires.

roleActions.Name: Standard-issue Elixir
roleActions.Description:
Restores your HP and MP to maximum.
Casting will be interrupted when damage is taken.

roleActions.Name: Sprint
roleActions.Description:
Increases movement speed by 50%.
Effect ends upon reuse or execution of another action.
